attributes.review: If I could give this app zero stars I would. This is the worst app out their, it’s useless and boring, and to top it off THEY STOLE MY INFORMATION!!! Wish I never downloaded it.
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER.

attributes.review: It’s day 246 with out food and water, this app still hasn’t downloaded. My family is going insane. Help me. Genz pls rise up and kill trump. He has abducted us. SAVE THIS COUNTRY
attributes.title: TRUMP KILLED MY FAMILY

attributes.review: Prejudice and racism should not be allowed on the App Store. Sad that #apple would allow this content.
attributes.title: Horrible content

attributes.review: This app went and left a virus onto my phone when I downloaded it, I just wanted to join the racist army that is Trump supporters!😩
attributes.title: Trash

attributes.review: i had high hopes for this app considering it represents my beautiful trump president, but i REPEAT do NOT download. was glitching and now the only words i can say is “TRUMP 2020 🇺🇸” with a bud light in my hand. a cult
attributes.title: DONT DOWNLOAD

attributes.review: Trumps app is hurting my feelings, I politely asked it to start and it took 420 days and 69 minutes to download! I promise you this is not fake news 😔
attributes.title: Big D Donald

attributes.review: I though this app would have rad shirtless trump picks, sadly I was very disappointed that it was just was boring stuff!
attributes.title: Disappointing

attributes.review: 30 seconds after the download finished I got a phone call informing me that my entire family was viciously murdered by a flock of pigeons.
attributes.title: DANGEROUS APP

attributes.review: First it took 3 days to download to all of the information is false don’t get
attributes.title: Awful app don’t get

attributes.review: I waited so long for the app to load...only for it to not work.I don’t recommend wasting your time on this app...ever!
attributes.title: Toooooo long
